description.lang: The smart metering plug controls devices remotely and records the power consumption of electronic devices. It is very convenient to use, for example, people can use the APP to switch on their coffee maker and air conditioner before they come back home by using the smart metering plug, they can also switch off lights, TV set and other electronic devices in house by just clicking one button in the APP when they want to go sleep. The smart metering plug makes people's life more comfortable.
Association group 1: Lifeline association groupInclude command classes: Switch Binary report, Meter Report and Device Reset Locally notification.
